MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the PA18 postcode area of Wemyss Bay. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 4:00pm due to an underground cable fault near Kelly Bridge substation and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 5:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3:25pm on Saturday, 13 February 2021
